name: Nine Knives
description:
Jump, dodge, smash, and shoot your way through endless hordes of alien ships with your nine trusty knives that will never leave your side (at least, not for more than 10 seconds at a time).

Nine Knives Credits:

Kaiway Tang (programming, art)

Henry Wang (programming)

Ming Zhu (programming, UI, sound)

Charlie Acquisto (art)
